title: MetaMCP Endpoints
description: Create public unified MCP server endpoints that map to namespaces for external access
createEndpointDescription: Create a new public endpoint and select a namespace to map it to
name: Name
noNamespacesAvailable: No namespaces available. Create some namespaces first.
useQueryParamAuthDescription: Allow API key in query parameter
createMcpServerDescription: Automatically create an MCP server for this endpoint
createFirstEndpoint: Create your first endpoint to get started
confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this endpoint?
deleteConfirmation: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the endpoint and remove all associated data.
ownershipDescription: Private endpoints are only accessible to you. Public endpoints are accessible to all users.
namespaceDescription: Select the namespace this endpoint should map to.
apiKeyAuthDescription: Require API key for endpoint access
oauthHttpsWarning: ⚠️ OAuth requires HTTPS in production environments for security
queryParamAuthDescription: Accept API key via ?api_key= in addition to Authorization header
createMcpServerExplanation: This will create a Streamable HTTP MCP server configuration that you can use to inspect this endpoint.

edit.title: Edit Endpoint
edit.description: Update the endpoint name, description, and reassign to a different namespace.
edit.nameHelpText: URL-compatible name (alphanumeric, underscore, and hyphen only). This will be accessible at /metamcp/[name]
edit.namespaceHelpText: Select the namespace this endpoint should map to.
edit.enableApiKeyAuthDescription: Require API key for endpoint access
edit.useQueryParamAuthDescription: Accept API key via ?api_key= in addition to Authorization header
edit.oauthHttpsWarning: ⚠️ OAuth requires HTTPS in production environments for security

list.title: Endpoints
list.noEndpointsDescription: You haven't created any endpoints yet. Get started by creating your first endpoint to make your namespaces publicly accessible.

list.copyShttpUrlWithApiKey: Copy SHTTP URL with API key
list.copyOpenApiUrlWithApiKey: Copy OpenAPI URL with API key
